required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Therapeutic Plasmaexhange on Viscoelastic Tests in Non-coagulopathic Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Therapeutic Plasmaexhange on Viscoelastic Tests in Non-coagulopathic Patients

brief_summary.textblock: Therapeutic plasma exchange is widely performed in patients with autoimmune disease. The exact effects of fresh frozen plasma on coagulation in this group of patients remains unknown. In order to investigate this issue the present study monitors periprocedural coagulation status with the aid of standard coagulation tests and rotational thromboelastometry. Four thromboelastometric tests will be performed: ExTEM, InTEM, FibTEM and ApTEM. The following parameters will be recorded from each test: CT (sec), CFT (sec) and MCF (mm) one hour before and one hour after plasmaechange was performed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: one hour before compared to one hour after plasmaexchange
primary_outcome.description: change in CT determined before and after plasmaexchange. A 20% change in parameter value will be considered clinically significant.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one hour before compared to one hour after plasmaexchange
secondary_outcome.description: change in CFT determined before and after plasmaexchange. A 20% change in parameter value will be considered clinically significant.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one hour before compared to one hour after plasmaexchange
secondary_outcome.description: change in MCF determined before and after plasmaexchange. A 20% change in parameter value will be considered clinically significant.

intervention.description: the effects of fresh frozen plasma administered during a plasma exchange therapy on viscoelastic tests

study_pop.textblock: consecutive patients undergoing therapeutic plasmaechange for autoimmune disease

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients undergoing therapeutic plasma exchange for autoimmune disease
Exclusion Criteria:
- previous coagulation disorders
- anticoagulant or antiplatelet therapy within the last 7 days
